overview: To celebrate the release of their fifth studio album, Australian metalcore band In Hearts Wake put on a special one night only livestream event, showcasing tracks from Kaliyuga as well as fan favourites.
tagline: Release week is always a special moment we always try to share with our fans, and we arenâ€™t going to let the-virus-that-shall-not-be-named stop us!
title: In Hearts Wake: Kaliyuga Live
